title: i played 5 games yesterday after a break, logged on today and now im 8 days from decay?
body: is this a bug or smth cuz i dont wanna decay i just got d4 again ;-;

replies.body: I do see you played a few games yesterday in Solo queue.  It looks like your last matches in Ranked Flex was on 2016-12-31 though.  Since they are separate queues you'll need to make sure they are both being maintained.  Let me know if that clears things up!

oh i forgot about that queue
ill just let it decay prbably i dont care about my flex rank 
thanks tho
